![](https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/images/logo.png)

We are pleased to announce a new destination for DeepNet Solutions!  
We now offer Dallas, Texas, USA! 

<br /><hr /><br />

With this new location, we are happy to announce a huge discount! Obtain 75% OFF on the first month on ANY of our Premium OpenVZ in Dallas!

**Use this promo code: "DAL75OFF1"**

Order link: http://krkn.pw/vps

You can have a VPS starting as low as $0.56 for the first month!

* This is not valid for other locations.
* We do not tolerate abuse and spamming.


<br /><hr /><br />


Other news:
-----------

* All our Premium VPS customers can request a FREE 1GB cPanel Hosting account to manage their email, Web and DNS. You will find the addon inside the Client Area. Limit of 1 per customer and valid for all the VPS lifetime.

* We now offer cPanel Web Hosting in Los Angeles! You can view all our plans directly on our website.

* We have more news and products coming in the next weeks! Stay tuned!

<br /><hr /><br />

**Please note that this promotion is until stocks are exhausted. So hurry!**

* All our VPS support TUN/TAP/PPP
* We accept TOR Relay on our Dedicated IPv4 VPS. Read AuP for more information
* We accept Paypal, Stripe and Bitcoin (via Bitpay)
* Looking Glass: https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/faq.html
* We speak French and English. You can reach us 24/7, via the following link: http://krkn.pw/contact

Regards, David.
